snippet: Mark Smucker, president of the consumer and natural foods unit and nephew of the current chief, will assume that role May 1.
abstract: JM Smucker Company names Mark T Smucker to replace his uncle, Richard K Smucker, as chief executive.
lead_paragraph: Mark Smucker, president of the consumer and natural foods unit and nephew of the current chief, will assume that role May 1.

headline.print_headline: New Chief Executive Is Named at J. M. Smucker Company
headline.main: Mark Smucker Is Named C.E.O. at J.M. Smucker Company
